General.Name: Qingdao Sentury Tire Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao Sentury Tire Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells tires in China. It offers PCR, motorsports, and aircraft tires under the SENTURY, LANDSAIL, DELINTE, and GROUNDSPEED brands. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Qingdao, China.
